snippet.title: A Mortician's Tale Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A Mortician's Tale is OUT NOW for PC/Mac!

🖤  Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/578720
🖤  Humble: https://humblebundle.com/store/a-morticians-tale
🖤  Itch.io: https://laundrybear.itch.io/morticians-tale
🖤  Website: http://morticianstale.com

//

🖤 Trailer art by A Mortician's Tale illustrator Jacquelin de Leon: https://www.instagram.com/jacquelindeleon/
🖤 Original soundtrack by Halina Heron: https://hlnhrn.bandcamp.com/

//

We would like to acknowledge funding support from the Ontario Arts Council, an agency of the Government of Ontario: http://www.arts.on.ca/
